amendment.description: Amendment deletes $1.17 million appropriated for the Library of Congress' American Folklife Center and provides $1.1 million to the Congressional Budget Office to fund additional responsibilities under the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the $1.17 million appropriation in the bill for the American Folklife Center and to provide an additional $1.1 million in appropriations for the Congressional Budget Office to fund the new responsibilities required of that office by the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clinger amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 159 (Roll no. 411).
